text_logic_form: The area of the parallelogram $ABCD$ is $2000$ square units.
Find the length of the base of the parallelogram.
dissolved_text_logic_form: The area of the parallelogram $ABCD$ is $2000$ square units.
Find the length of the line $AD$.
diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $BC$ is $x+10$.
The length of the line $BE$ is $x$.
The point $E$ lies on the line $AD$.
The line $EB$ is perpendicular to the line $ED$.
line_instances: There are lines $AB$, $AD$, $AE$, $BC$, $BE$, $DC$, and $DE$, forming the parallelogram $ABCD$.
The line $AB$ is parallel to the line $DC$.
The line $AD$ is parallel to the line $BC$.
The line $AE$ is parallel to the line $BE$.
The line $DC$ is parallel to the line $BE$.
The line $AB$ is congruent to the line $DC$.
The line $AD$ is congruent to the line $BC$.
